rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious entrance combined with an open living area designed to maximize natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side. The design follows Art Deco aesthetics with geometric patterns in decor.

rooms.name: Dining Room and Kitchen
rooms.description: Integrated kitchen with an adjoining dining area. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the south side to encourage cross ventilation and natural light, following Art Deco design elements.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom and Study
rooms.description: Multi-functional space serving as a guest bedroom and study area. Includes floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side ensuring ample evening light with a nod to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Joint Family Prayer Room
rooms.description: A dedicated prayer room to cater for joint family traditions. Features minimalistic Art Deco elements with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to capture morning light.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Compact space for the household staff. Ventilated with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side in adherence to Vastu recommendations.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Reinforced door ensuring security with an Art Deco design, complemented by floor-to-ceiling windows enhancing natural light.

openings.name: Emergency Exit
openings.description: Compliant with local safety regulations and Vastu recommendations, ensuring proper evacuation routes.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side for abundant morning light. Decorated in Art Deco style with modern amenities.

rooms.name: Child Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two adjoining bedrooms designed for children with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south-west side to balance natural light. Incorporates Art Deco details.

rooms.name: Family Study/Living Room
rooms.description: Multi-functional space combining study and leisure. Features floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side ensuring ample evening light.

rooms.name: Guest Bathrooms
rooms.description: Dedicated guest bathrooms with natural ventilation provided by floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side in compliance with Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: A wide staircase with Art Deco balustrades, ensuring safe and aesthetic transition between floors.

openings.name: Fire Escape Route
openings.description: Compliant with safety standards and Vastu guidelines for quick evacuation.
